data.title: Lilli Palmer
data.meta_description: Explore the filmography of Lilli Palmer on Rotten Tomatoes! Discover ratings, reviews, and more. Click for details!
data.text:
Highest Rated: 92% Body and Soul (1947)

Lowest Rated: 10% De Sade (1969)

Birthday: May 24, 1914

Birthplace: Posen, Prussia, Germany

Poised, sophisticated leading lady who arrived in Paris from her native Germany in 1932 and eventually landed in England, where she made her screen debut in 1935. Palmer touched down in Hollywood in 1945 with her first husband, actor Rex Harrison, and returned to Europe nine years later, where she continued to appear in a number of international features.

Highest rated movies

87% Secret Agent

83% The Other Side of the Wind

83% Hero of Montmartre

80% Cloak and Dagger

75% Operation Crossbow

71% Conspiracy of Hearts

70% The Boys From Brazil
